content.prompt: Based on the population pyramid, which of the following will pose the greatest demographic challenge to China beginning in 2029?

choices.label: Providing for the needs of its aging population
Finding enough teachers to educate the young
Limiting out-migration of the 60- to 64-year-old age cohort

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data to draw conclusions.
